sub_title: Ouderenmarketing | Expert Mature Marketing | Founder Grey Ocean AGEnSee | author Grey Ocean Strategy | Promovendus
summary:
Since 2000, Edgar Keehnen has been helping many organisations to exploit the biggest market ever, the market of mature consumers. Helping them with concept development, workshops, market research, consulting, ad-interim assignments......  

He has been a speaker on the subject on various industry forums and for many companies in the Netherlands as well as in for example London, Copenhagen, Valencia, New Orleans and New York. Edgar is (co-)author of various books on the subject of mature marketing and member of the Speaker's Academy.

Edgar earned his M.B.A. at Erasmus University in Rotterdam, the Netherlands, after studies at Nyenrode Business University and the University of Michigan. He furthermore attended various hotel management courses at Cornell University School of Hotel Administration in Ithaca, New York.

He is a part-time lecturer of Strategy, Innovation and Marketing and coach at Erasmus University School of Economics, TMO Fashion Business School and Wittenborg University of Applied Sciences.  Edgar worked for companies such as American Express, OHRA Bank and Insurances Group, and Swedish Telecom TeleMedia Yellow Pages as Director of Marketing, Sales and Customer Services. 

Edgar joined the PhD-school at Nyenrode Business Universiteit for his researchprogram about hospitality and elderly. 

He is an engaged individual with strong interpersonal skills and great empathic ability.  
His favorite quote? “Life goes so fast, so always eat your dessert first.”
